channel.title: News | Buddies of Budgie
channel.description: Buddies of Budgie posts in the category News

item.title: Budgie 10.8.1 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.8.1 is the first minor release in the 10.8 series of our Budgie Desktop environment. This release adds dark style preference support, squashes some bugs around our new StatusNotifierItem implementation, adds keyword support for search, and more!

item.title: Budgie 10.8 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.8 is a brand new release series for Budgie Desktop, featuring improvements to Budgie Menu, adoption of StatusNotifier support in System Tray, Magpie v0.x support, and more!

item.title: Wayland.
item.description: Let's talk about our plans for Wayland support for Budgie Desktop and the work we are doing to make it a reality.

item.title: Budgie 10.7.2 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.7.2 is the second minor release in the 10.7 series of our Budgie Desktop environment, primarily focused on bug fixes, additional compatibility with GNOME 44 stack, and various quality-of-life improvements.

item.title: Budgie 10.7.1 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.7.1 is the first minor release in the 10.7 series of our Budgie Desktop environment, introducing some improvements, bug fixes, and updated translations.

item.title: Budgie 10.7 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.7 is a brand new release series for Budgie Desktop, featuring major re-architectures, new APIs for extensibility, and polish to the user experience.

item.title: State of the Budgie: 2022 In Review and Goals for 2023
item.description: 2022 was an incredible year for the Budgie Desktop and the Buddies of Budgie organization, with 2023 set to be even better. Let us dive into it in this special State of the Budgie to recap the happenings of 2022 and the goals for 2023.

item.title: Budgie 10.6.4 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.6.4 is the fourth minor release in the 10.6 series of our Budgie Desktop environment. This release contains bug fixes and build system improvements.

item.title: Budgie 10.6.3 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.6.3 is the third minor release in the 10.6 series of our Budgie Desktop environment, introducing improvements to our Workspace Applet and initial support for GNOME 43!

item.title: State of the Budgie: July 2022
item.description: This is the State of the Budgie for July 2022, covering the latest happenings in the month of July!

item.title: Budgie 10.6.2 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.6.2 is the second minor release in the 10.6 series of our Budgie Desktop environment, introducing fixes for bugs and improving code quality!

item.title: State of the Budgie: May 2022
item.description: This is the State of the Budgie for May 2022, covering the latest happenings this month!

item.title: State of the Budgie: April 2022
item.description: As a mini "State of the Budgie" for April 2022, here is what has been done so far and what is coming up in the near future!

item.title: Budgie 10.6.1 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.6.1 is the first minor release that introduces fixes for bugs in the 10.6 series of our Budgie Desktop environment.

item.title: Budgie 10.6 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.6 is the first release of Budgie under the new Buddies Of Budgie organization! ðŸš€ðŸš€ðŸš€

item.title: Budgie 10.5.3 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.5.3 is a minor release that introduces fixes for bugs, various quality-of-life improvements, and support for the GNOME 40 stack.

item.title: Budgie 10.5.2 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.5.2 introduces new goodies to make your Budgie experience even better!

item.title: Budgie Desktop View: First Development Release!
item.description: Today we are thrilled to announce the first generally public development release of Budgie Desktop View!

item.title: Budgie 10.5.1 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.5.1 is the first minor release of the Budgie 10.5 series, introducing a multitude of quality-of-life changes, bug fixes, and support for new GNOME Stacks.

item.title: Budgie 10.5 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.5 is the first release in our series 5 updates for Budgie 10!

item.title: Budgie 10.4 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.4 is the first release in our series 4 updates for Budgie 10!

item.title: Budgie 10.3 Released
item.description: Budgie 10.3 is the first release in our series 3 updates for Budgie 10!
